name: Counter-Strike
content:
custom-name: Counter-Strike 1.6 LAN
files:
- archive: https://www.mux.re/share/cslan.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  args: -game cstrike
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Valve Lan/hl.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    description: Extracting archive...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/setup_files/
    file: setup_files
- task:
    description: Installing engine (Half Life v1.4.3 Lite)...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/setup_files/cslan-HL143lite.exe
    name: wineexec
- task:
    description: Installing Counter-Strike 1.6 LAN...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/setup_files/cslan-CS16lan.exe
    name: wineexec
- task:
    description: Installing Pack AMX v3...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/setup_files/cslan-pack_amx3.exe
    name: wineexec
- task:
    description: Installing No-steam Patch...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/setup_files/cslan-patch143.exe
    name: wineexec
